name: Roll of the Rice
description:
Supersonic Crab submission for GMTK Game Jam 2022!

Your goal is to get as close as possible to the number the sushi chef gives you by buying and eating sushi! If you end up with the exact number before you get too full or run out of money the whole meal is free, and who doesn't love a free meal?


If you are receiving a message that says "The following components are required to run this program: Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime" you can download this distributable to fix it https://docs.microsoft.com/en-US/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msv...

Credits:

Ira Zerrudo - UI and game design
Ethan Powell - 3D Modelling and texturing
Matthew McDonald - Gameplay design
Christopher Major - Programming, gameplay design
Eric Mazza - UMG programming

Special thanks:
Emily Lepp - Splash screen
